## BronziteClient.addHook() method

Adds a hook to the client.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addHook(hook: HookPriority, cb: HookCallback): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  hook | [HookPriority](./framework.hookpriority.md) | The [hook priority](./framework.hookpriority.md) this hook should run on. |
|  cb | [HookCallback](./framework.hookcallback.md) | The callback to run. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
